DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether woman history baby intrauterine growth retardation ( IUGR ) likely risk factor cardiovascular disease versus woman pregnancy complicate IUGR .
DOC.brief_title: Fetal Growth Restriction & Maternal Cardiovascular Risk
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : Intrauterine growth restriction lead major neonatal morbidity mortality . Moreover , recent birth registry study suggest woman bear IUGR baby may elevate risk cardiovascular disease . DESIGN NARRATIVE : This cohort study test whether exposed woman , previous intrauterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) baby , versus unexposed woman , pregnancy complicate IUGR , elevations marker cardiovascular risk . Exposure define among geographically define cohort singleton baby < 5 % tile weight gestational age , absence pre-pregnancy diabetes. , hypertension , renal disease , hypertension pregnancy ; control singleton > 20 % tile . Four twelve year postpartum , woman assess multiple marker cardiovascular risk , include blood pressure , lipid , adiposity , glucose insulin , homocysteine folate , marker inflammation , marker endothelial function , marker angiogenesis , marker vascular function . Data analysis consist ANOVA ANCOVA analyse compare outcome cardiovascular marker among expose unexposed woman .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : woman 4 12 year delivery singleton infant woman give birth 1997 2002 MageeWomens Hospital Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania Exclusion criterion : woman preeclampsia woman prepregnancy hypertension woman diabetes woman currently pregnant report prepregnancy chronic condition
